entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon.
